Name: Otto von Erdmannsdorff
Function: Secretary in the Foreign Ministry; deputy to Wörmann.

Name: Edmund Veesenmayer
Sentence: 20 years' imprisonment; reduced to 10 years in 1951 and released the same year.

Name: Hans Heinrich Lammers
Sentence: 20 years' imprisonment; reduced to 10 years in January 1951 and released December 16, 1951.

Name: Wilhelm Stuckart
Function: Secretary of State in the Interior Ministry
Sentence: Time already served (3 years and 10 months)
